DOC.brief_summary: A Phase 3, Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Multi-Center Study to Evaluate Safety and Efficacy of PHX1149T as Monotherapy in Subjects with Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy Study of Dutogliptin/PHX1149T to Treat Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes mellitus, drug na√Øve or willing to washout from existing oral therapy BMI 25 to 48 kg/m2, inclusive HbA1c 7.0% 10.0%, inclusive Age 18 to 75 years, inclusive Currently on 3 or more oral antidiabetic drugs or insulin. Type 1 diabetes mellitus
